title: Form Submission Processing
description: Schema for analyzing and processing a submitted form entry using AI.

formId.description: Unique identifier for the form being submitted.

entry.description: The actual form entry data submitted by the user.

submittedFields.description: Key-value pairs of submitted form fields.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the form was submitted.

formDescription.description: A brief description of the formâ€™s intent to help AI interpret the entry.

analysis.description: AI-generated analysis based on the form entry.

entryValidity.description: Whether the submitted entry passes form validation and rules.

purposeAnalysis.description: AI-inferred purpose of the submission, based on its contents.

feedback.description: List of issues, suggestions, or improvements for the entry.

actions.description: Actions to perform after analyzing the submission.

sendEmailNotification.description: Whether an email should be sent based on the submission.

redirectUrl.description: URL to redirect the user after form submission (if needed).

displayMessage.description: Custom message to show the user post-submission.
